title: bc服开启后显示if you wish to use ip forwarding，please enable it in your Buge...
author: 怪兽大人
txt_content:
如题bc服开启后显示if you wish to use ip forwarding，please enable it in your bugeecord cofig as well。
已经在bc的中将ip_forward改为 true


和个子服的spigot.yml的bungeecord改为true


但还是显示if you wish to use ip forwarding，please enable it in your bugeecord cofig as well。

replies.author: 陌裂大大
replies.txt_content: 改完有重启过子服的服务器吗

replies.author: Ling_Haner
replies.txt_content: 按理说应该是没问题的，改完之后重启全部的子服 和 bc试试？

replies.author: 怪兽大人
replies.txt_content:
Ling_Haner 发表于 2020-5-4 11:41
按理说应该是没问题的，改完之后重启全部的子服 和 bc试试？
重启了...不知道哪出错了..

replies.author: Ling_Haner
replies.txt_content:
怪兽大人 发表于 2020-5-4 11:45
重启了...不知道哪出错了..
把bc的配置和spigot.yml发上来看看吧 可能你设置错了

replies.author: kongkong7
replies.txt_content:
将server.properties文件里面的
设置成  server-ip=127.0.0.1  这样试试

replies.author: 怪兽大人
replies.txt_content:
kongkong7 发表于 2020-5-4 11:47
将server.properties文件里面的
设置成  server-ip=127.0.0.1  这样试试
改了之后服务器直接灭了，我以前是没写server—ip

replies.author: kongkong7
replies.txt_content:
你不是BC吗 怎么可能灭了
顶多服务器进不去 
可能你配置真的有错误
你可以 上传一下BC的配置文件看看

replies.author: 怪兽大人
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 怪兽大人 于 2020-5-4 12:06 编辑 

forge_support: false
connection_throttle_limit: 3
timeout: 30000
online_mode: false
log_commands: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577

replies.author: 怪兽大人
replies.txt_content:
这是rpg子服的spigot.yml# This is the main configuration file for Spigot.
# As you can see, there's tons to configure. Some options may impact gameplay, so use
# with caution, and make sure you know what each option does before configuring.
# For a reference for any variable inside this file, check out the Spigot wiki at
# http://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/spigot-configuration/
# 
# If you need help with the configuration or have any questions related to Spigot,
# join us at the IRC or drop by our forums and leave a post.
# 
# IRC: #spigot @ irc.spi.gt ( http://www.spigotmc.org/pages/irc/ )
# Forums: http://www.spigotmc.org/

config-version: 11
settings:
  debug: false
  save-user-cache-on-stop-only: false
  moved-too-quickly-multiplier: 10.0
  filter-creative-items: true
  moved-wrongly-threshold: 0.0625
  timeout-time: 60
  restart-on-crash: true
  restart-script: ./start.sh
  item-dirty-ticks: 20
  attribute:
    maxHealth:
      max: 1.0E16
    movementSpeed:
      max: 1.0E16
    attackDamage:
      max: 1.0E16
  sample-count: 12
  player-shuffle: 0
  bungeecord: true
  late-bind: false
  int-cache-limit: 2048
  user-cache-size: 0
  netty-threads: 4
commands:
  tab-complete: 0
  silent-commandblock-console: false
  spam-exclusions:
  - /skill
  log: true
  replace-commands:
  - setblock
  - summon
  - testforblock
  - tellraw
messages:
  whitelist: You are not whitelisted on this server!
  unknown-command: Unknown command. Type "/help" for help.
  server-full: The server is full!
  outdated-client: Outdated client! Please use {0}
  outdated-server: Outdated server! I'm still on {0}
  restart: Server is restarting
advancements:
  disable-saving: false
  disabled:
  - minecraft:story/disabled
stats:
  disable-saving: false
  forced-stats: {}
world-settings:
  default:
    verbose: true
    merge-radius:
      item: 2.5
      exp: 3.0
    item-despawn-rate: 6000
    zombie-aggressive-towards-villager: true
    enable-zombie-pigmen-portal-spawns: true
    wither-spawn-sound-radius: 0
    hanging-tick-frequency: 100
    arrow-despawn-rate: 1200
    view-distance: 4
    nerf-spawner-mobs: false
    squid-spawn-range:
      min: 45.0
    growth:
      cactus-modifier: 100
      cane-modifier: 100
      melon-modifier: 100
      mushroom-modifier: 100
      pumpkin-modifier: 100
      sapling-modifier: 100
      wheat-modifier: 100
      netherwart-modifier: 100
      vine-modifier: 100
      cocoa-modifier: 100
    hunger:
      jump-walk-exhaustion: 0.05
      jump-sprint-exhaustion: 0.2
      combat-exhaustion: 0.1
      regen-exhaustion: 6.0
      swim-multiplier: 0.01
      sprint-multiplier: 0.1
      other-multiplier: 0.0
    max-tnt-per-tick: 20
    random-light-updates: false
    mob-spawn-range: 4
    entity-activation-range:
      animals: 12
      monsters: 32
      misc: 12
      tick-inactive-villagers: true
    max-tick-time:
      tile: 20
      entity: 30
    entity-tracking-range:
      players: 40
      animals: 40
      monsters: 40

      other: 48

    seed-slime: 987234911

replies.author: kongkong7
replies.txt_content:
priorities:
  - 登录服
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:43013

servers:
  登录服:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:43013
    restricted: false

这两个端口不要设置一样试试


按道理来说这两个应该是不能一样的

replies.author: Parker.
replies.txt_content:
Bc端的IP转发没开
或者单端的Spigot.yml中的BC选项没关掉
